sentence.Network_en: At last one of these neighbours , fat, pursy, and worthy as himself , came to his aid.
sentence.Network_cn: 终于这伙人当中有一个出来替他解围, 此人又胖又矮, 同皮货商一样令人起敬.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: reduction of Anglo-Norman French porsif, alteration of Old French polsif, from polser 'breathe with difficulty', from Latin pulsare 'set in violent motion'
